Name: Bombay Lassi Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
MUDDLE cardamom in base of shaker.
Review: Creamy yet balanced, even slightly tart rather than sweet, with hints of vanilla, cardamom, ginger, and lemon.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
